name: visual-studio-meeting-scheduler
description: A meeting scheduler extension for Microsoft's VSTS platform for organising meetings.

scripts.dev: npm run dev_server & npm run watch_sass
scripts.build: npm run sass; npm run autoprefix; npm run version; npm run clean_copy; npm run webpack; npm run extension
scripts.version: awk -F'["]' -v OFS='"'  '/"version":/{split($4,a,".");$4=a[1]"."a[2]"."a[3]+1};1' src/vss-extension.json > src/vss-extension.json~; mv src/vss-extension.json~ src/vss-extension.json
scripts.clean_copy: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cp -R src/assets src/vss-extension.json src/index.html build
scripts.extension: tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --root build --output-path build --share-with vs1team8
scripts.publish: tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --root build --output-path build --share-with vs1team8

author: Mujavid Bukhari, Alasdair Hall and Kelvin Chan
